metadata.title: CVE-2017-18021 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
It was discovered that QtPass before 1.2.1, when using the built-inpassword generator, generates possibly predictable and enumerablepasswords. This only applies to the QtPass GUI.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-18021` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

qtpass - 1.2.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: qtpass package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.1-1').
